About Me

I'm a Senior Software Engineer with over 10 years of experience building scalable systems, clean architecture, and performance-optimized applications.

Professional Summary

I specialize in building maintainable, scalable web applications using modern best practices. My expertise spans full-stack development, performance optimization, and creating codebases that stand the test of time.
